document_data.name: Tartha
document_data.mainbody: '''Tartha''' was a [[fire giant]] duchess sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History:
Tartha was one of the [[giant]] lords at the time of the shattering of the [[Ordning (social structure)|ordning]].

In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, Tartha was one of the giant lords who arrived in [[Maelstrom (fortress)|Maelstrom]] in search of news about Princess Serissa's plans for the future.
